TopicTitle: Help with KAS and Kethane on Mac

Articles.Content:
I downloaded KSP about a week ago and was hooked. I was running it on Windows using Parallel and started having lagging issues when I got into bigger stations. I then realized that there actually was a Mac version and I could probably get better performance out of it so I switched over. Everything seems to be fine, minus the normally crashing I had on windows and two things.

First, KAS.

Everything works fine with the exception of sound. Devices play no sounds whatsoever and when I go to launch a new rocket I get these annoying warning messages. I looked the sounds files were there but configured in .ogg instead of .wav like most of the game's files so i figured I try a conversion. No luck. Anyone know of a fix for the sound or if not a way to shut off the warning messages?

Next is Kethane my more annoying problem.

Kethane is probably my favorite mod because of the possibilities it added. When I boot up KSP I get a message saying the "the following mod is not supported with Unity blah blah blah". I said screw it and tried anyways. Everything works except for probably the most important part for me which is converting Kethane to fuel. I can mine it just fine, store it but I can't get it to convert at all.

For both of these problems I have looked all over the place and nothing has led me to believe that these mods shouldn't work for Mac. If anyone can help that would be greatly appreciated. Thanks
Bump- I'm having the same issue with Kethane.
